subject: Pro X Ultra LED Problem
description_text:
Hi,

I Just received the Pro X Ultra pedals and during my setup I noticed that
there is one LED on the throttle pedal that is permanently stuck on Red,
even if you turn off the lights in the software! (See attached photos) Is
there any way I can get a replacement throttle set out?

I purchased on Nov 20th, 2025 on AliExpress. Order ID: 8206400752272432

Thanks,
Nick

conversations.body_text:
All your link does is send me to your support home page. There is no way for me to check on the status of this support ticket

Thanks
Nick
________________________________
